metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1114 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was found that URLResource.getLastModified() in Undertow closes the file descriptors only when they are finalized which can cause file descriptors to exhaust. This leads to a file handler leak.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
